page.title: 16A special day in my life.
page.content: Yesterday July 3rd 1985 it was my eleventh birthday.My mum called me to get up.I went into her bedroom and got her up.Then I went excitedly down stairs and brought my cards back up and opened them.I counted up my present money and it came to Â£6.85 but my mum gave me another 15p and the total came to Â£7.00 precisely.I dressed,had my breakfast of corn flakes ,washed myself thoroughly and brushed my hair.My mum also dressed herself and we went up town going into Woolworth's Department Store.We had a look at some toys but my mum saw some swimming goggles which were 99p so l bought them.That left me with Â£6.01 exactly.I had a bun,and an ice lolly,and a drink of pop as a birthday treat.Then we set off for the video shop to choose a video called "Lion Man." By Christopher Barker.
